title: @Meddler Context behind the Gunblade changes on PBE?

embed.description: The PBE has been updated! As we kick off the 6.6 PBE cycle, today's patch includes Aurelion Sol, new skins for Draven, Maokai, Tahm Kench, and Vel'Koz, a new ward skin, new summoner icons, DRAVEN minions, a pre-Alpha PBE test of the LCU, a ton of balance changes, and more!

body:
In today's patch the Gunblade changes were removed but they were:

** Hextech Gunblade**

    Unique active:

*         Renamed to "Capture Bolt"
*         Notes it the active shares a cooldown with other Bolt items.
*         Damage increased to 200 from 150.

Any reason into why changes to the item in the first place? Seems random, but it looks like they could be introducing new items with the same active, since there is currently no item that has an active named 'Capture Bolt'.

replies.body: That's a bit of an oops on our part, that wasn't intended to go to the PBE (should have been an internal test environment only, at least for now). We're experimenting with possible AP item changes for the mid year patch that will include the mage updates amongst other things. As part of that experimentation we're investigating possible changes to Revolver, WotA and Gunblade.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uMaNZQHF,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-16T00:21:25.969+0000)
>
> That's a bit of an oops on our part, that wasn't intended to go to the PBE (should have been an internal test environment only, at least for now). We're experimenting with possible AP item changes for the mid year patch that will include the mage updates amongst other things. As part of that experimentation we're investigating possible changes to Revolver, WotA and Gunblade.

Finally getting rid of Spell Vamp?  RIP Vlad and sustain mages.

They're not getting rid of spellvamp. They're looking for ways to rework Vladmir in particular so they they can also rework spell vamp items/sources without it making Vladmir overbearing or even harder to balance and keep healthy.

As a result, items that give spell vamp are also being looked at in addition to Vladmir and the rest of the Mages involved in the update.
Thank you for the reply! Would working on those items finally means Spellvamp as a stat will get a full revamp?

@meddler can you finally make spellvamp and deaths dance work on aoe on champions.....? its such a noob trap on characters like varus for example. minion sustain is toxic and unsatisfying anyway. Just give us functional combat spellvamp on someone not Cassiopeia and vlad
I think the other "Bolt" items might be {{item:3144}} & {{item:3153}} . But that is just a guess on my part.

The active name is 'Capture Bolt', but the keyword it actually uses is 'Bolt'. So anything with 'Bolt' in the active name will share a cooldown with it... though I don't know if there are any current 'Bolt' items to begin with, so that's probably just semantics.
